entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Epic: IDistributedCache updates in .NET 9 #53255
    9.0.0
  • Scoped CSS Not Working Correctly for Components in the Root 'Pages' Folder #53248
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21319: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #53246
  • ForbidResult results 200 status code instead of 403 #53244
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect 7.1.2 #53243
  • [Java Client] No proguard file declaring that we need to keep class members #53238
  • [Blazor] Unable to debug in lazy loaded assemblies #53235
  • Error Headers are read-only, response has already started .net 8 blazor #53240
  • Disable Refresh Page When Post Form In Blazor #53241
  • InputSelect not work in blazor .net 8 #53242
  • Blazor webassembly application is showing wrong culture #53233
  • Fluent UI or any other Package Static File 404 Error in ASP.NET Core MVC Project #53230
  • New users are confused by the "Failed to determine the https port for redirect" warning #53229
  • SignalR Firefox tests disabled on Mac #53228

Closed

  • [8.0] RouteHandlerAnalyzer throws InvalidOperationException #50836
  • Move back to NPM #37398
    9.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #53207
  • Perf improvement: json, json #53231
  • [Infrastructure] get-version fails on our CI because node is not installed by the CI pipeline. #53091
  • Re-enable source index #51709
  • Blazor Web App - HTTP headers missing from inside a component when using IHttpContextAccessor #53192
  • [blazor][wasm] Remaining legacy interop #48042
    .NET 9 Planning
  • blazor server signalr JsonReaderException #44520
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor 8 + Firefox routing issue - NS_ERROR_NET_RESET #53164
  • [AOT] Fix Blazor AOT warnings #45473
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [AOT] Make BindConverter safe for AOT or mark as unsafe #45578
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [AOT] Explore Alternatives to MakeGenericType/MakeGenericMethod For Web UI #45795
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add EndPoint #53183
  • Scaffolded form error: EditForm requires either a Model #53195
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #53217
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #53218
  • The JSON returned by SignalR does not contain the $type field #52342
    9.0-preview1
  • Build blazor.*.js in CI; don't commit the artifacts #11592
    9.0-preview1
  • Only use keyed services when keyed service provider is available #50277
    9.0-preview1
  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.InteractivityTest.AutoRenderMode_UsesBlazorServerOnFirstLoad_ThenWebAssemblyOnSuccessiveLoads #49961
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add option to disable form field as CSRF token source from `AntiforgeryOptions` #51912
    .NET 9 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [FabricBot] Remove usage of 'noActivitySince' operand condition #53256
    area-infrastructure
  • Only publish npm assets from Windows #53254
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Disable Yarn in Source Build on 8.0 #53253
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • Update IdentityModel version #53252
    area-infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #53251
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #53250
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #53249
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update karma.local.conf.js #53247
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] Blazor InputRadio is broken by IHandleEvent #53245
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Unify all our common dev dependencies #53237
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.24058.9 #53227
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve SignalR keyed services unsupported exception message #53226
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update Locker GitHub action to only lock issues (not PRs) #53225
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Disable Yarn in Source Build on 8.0 #53234
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.2
  • Always install node & build node components in CI #53154
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [blazor][wasm] Remove legacy interop #52732
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, 9.0-preview1
  • Add polymorphic support to SignalR STJ #53035
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview1
  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • Throw if resolving keyed service from non-keyed container #53051
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 9.0-preview1
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Auto render mode improvements #53159
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53157
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 8 Planning
  • Annotate Http.Connections for trimming #52918
    area-signalr, linker-friendliness
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Enable gRPC tests on MacOS 12 #53186
    area-grpc
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52928
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • InputBase should clear validation message store on Dispose for dynamic forms #53162
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Dispatch inbound activity handlers in Blazor Web apps #53185
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Prevent NPE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
